duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and oversee all the units and operations within a designated district.
Supervise and guide the development of unit managers, providing leadership and strategic direction.
Implement company policies, procedures, and operational processes at the district level to ensure efficiency and compliance.
Monitor and evaluate the financial performance of units within the district, making data-driven decisions to drive profitability.
Collaborate with senior leadership to develop and execute growth strategies and initiatives for the district.
